name: ShapeShit
description:
Follow the escape of an irrationally angry square as it 'shifts' to freedom.

- 10 Levels in total (9 + 10 are tricky but winnable)
- Normal Mode = restart level on death
- Hard Mode = restart at level 1

Controls:

A/D & LEFT/RIGHT arrows - left/right

W/Space/UP arrow - Jump

Left Shift - ShapeShift

Created by:

- Bas Tuijnman - Restarted the level...

- Bart Langedijk - Rolled a ball...

- Chris Lennon - Drunk some coffee...

- Joost Hoebe - Drew some things...

- Thomas Baillie - Copied some things...

External components -

Audio(https://freesound.org): fins & zagi2

Base tiles (for intro 'theme'): kenney.nl/assets

name was started as git typo

Bugs:

- Attempts to avoid death by lava result in being cast to eternal whitespace.

- User may vomit.

Web version also available: http://bastuijnman.github.io/ludum-dare-35/
